reviews.review_msg: As long as you review the textbook heavily and understand the big ideas from just skimming through lectures youll do great! He is willing to omit 1 major test and a few quizzes and his test are not cumulative. Attending lectures are a choice.

The essay questions are marked incredibly hard. You have to meberozre the exact specfic deatils he wants you too to get a good mark. Its unfair for a first year class in my poion, I've taken higher level courses that require less deatiled answers. Other then that hes not too bad, he tests on the textbook, NOT lectures

Lectures are kind of pointless, as long as you read the textbook you are fine. However, he does occasionally drop hints for essay questions in class so attendance is beneficial. Easy class with 7 iclicker quizzes, 1 assignment, and 4 midterms. Lowest quiz and test dropped, so its easy to do well
